Taupō District Council finds asbestos in Broadlands Rd landfillhttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/taupo-district-council-finds-asbestos-in-broadlands-rd-landfill/BA6PFBUVC5HIDPH64V5P2FKVKA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/taupo-district-council-finds-asbestos-in-broadlands-rd-landfill/BA6PFBUVC5HIDPH64V5P2FKVKA/ Concrete recycling at the site has been put on hold. The landfill remains open. Fri, 09 Aug 2024 06:07:16 +0000 Taupō District Council is testing its stockpiled waste concrete after asbestos was discovered in dumped concrete at Broadlands Rd Landfill.
